title: Understanding the Concept
text: When you calculate an average from a sample, like the data from $$30$$ weather stations, you're dealing with a specific type of data representation. This is not the entire population but a summary of it.

title: Defining Terms
text: A 'statistic' is a numerical value that describes a characteristic of a sample. In this case, the average temperature is a statistic because it summarizes the data from the sample of weather stations.

title: Identifying the Correct Term
text: Given the definition of a statistic, what term best describes the average temperature calculated from the sample data?
